actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill for the relief of United Broadcasting Co., of Florida, Inc.

summary.text: Permits a certain broadcasting corporation to appeal a Federal Communications Commission order regarding an application for renewal of license, and to continue operating pending a final judgment, if such appeal is taken.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of United Broadcasting Co., of Florida, Inc.
